Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-lad
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: Zhè shì yóuyú tāmen wéikàng zhēnzhǔ hé shǐzhě. Fán wéikàng zhēnzhǔ zhě, zhēnzhǔ bìdìng chéngfá tā, yīn wéi zhēnzhǔ de xíngfá què shì yánlì de
Wúlùn nǐmen kǎnfá hǎi zǎo shù, huò rèn qí yīrán cúnzài, dōu shì zhēnzhǔ suǒ zhǔnxǔ de, tā zhǔnxǔ fá shù, yuán wèi língrù fàngdàng zhě
Fán zhēnzhǔ shōu guī shǐzhě de nì chǎn, nǐmen dōu méiyǒu hàn mǎ zhī láo; dàn zhēnzhǔ shǐ zhòng shǐzhě, zhìfú tāsuǒ yìyù zhě; zhēnzhǔ duìyú wànshì, shì quánnéng de

Chéngshì de jūmín de nì chǎn, fán zhēnzhǔ shōu guī shǐzhě de, dōu guīzhēnzhǔ, shǐzhě, zhìqīn, gū'ér, pínmín hé lǚkè, yǐmiǎn nàxiē nì chǎn, chéng wèi zài nǐmen zhōng fùháo zhī jiān zhōuzhuǎn de dōngxī. Fán shǐzhě gěi nǐmen de, nǐmen dōu yīngdāng jiēshòu; fán shǐzhě jìnzhǐ nǐmen de, nǐmen dōu yīngdāng jièchú. Nǐmen yīngdāng jìngwèi zhēnzhǔ, zhēnzhǔ què shì xíngfá yánlì de

Nàxiē nì chǎn yībùfèn guī qiān shì zhōng de pínmín, tāmen céng bèi qūzhú chūjìng, yǐzhì sàngshī zìjǐ de fángwū hé cáichǎn. Tāmen xúnqiú cóng zhēnzhǔ fāchū de ēndiǎn hé xǐyuè, tāmen xiézhù zhēnzhǔ hé shǐzhě; zhè děng rén, què shì chéngshí de

Zài tāmen zhīqián, ānjū gùxiāng érqiě quèxìn zhèngdào de rénmen, tāmen xǐ 411 ài qiānjū lái de jiào bāomen, tāmen duìyú nàxiē jiào bāo suǒ huò de shǎngcì, bù huái yuànhèn, tāmen suī yǒu jíxū, yě yuàn bǎ zìjǐ suǒyǒu de ràng gěi nàxiē jiào bāo. Néng jièchú zìshēn de tān lìn zhě, cái shì chénggōng de
